sentence: Honor Pennsylvania, “Greatest Hits.” The PAC wars keep escalating between allies of TV personality Mehmet Oz and former Treasury official David McCormick, the two biggest-spending Republicans running for U.S. Senate.
title: The Trailer: In Texas, Republicans battle for room on the right
Beto O’Rourke snags the Democratic nomination for Texas governor.
Harris County, home to Houston, warns of delays in counting ballots.
A local candidate wants to transcend party. Does Texas allow that?
